prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Floor framing plan for second-story ADU above existing garage. Shows joist layout (2x12 and 2x14 at 16" O.C.), rafter framing (2x6 at 16" and 24" O.C.), floor and roof sheathing specs, shearwall post/strap locations, and a 7-row strap schedule with holdown sizes. Scale 1/4" = 1'-0".
key_content: Typ. wall stud framing: 2x4 studs @ 16" O.C.
Typ. floor sheathing: 3/4" APA Rated Struc-1, T&G, 24/0 — E.N. = 10d @ 6", F.N. = 10d @ 12" (no blocking required at seams)
Typ. roof sheathing: 12" APA Rated Exp-1, 32/16 — E.N. = 8d @ 6", F.N. = 8d @ 12" (no blocking required at seams)
Floor joists: 2x12 @ 16" O.C. and 2x14 @ 16" O.C. in multiple bays
Roof rafters: 2x6 @ 24" O.C. and 2x6 @ 16" O.C.
Engineered beam: 30x14 MSR (min. depth 13.25")
Strap schedule — STRAP1: CS18, 9", 16-10d, 1.31 kips (1.03 city), HDU1
Strap schedule — STRAP2: CS16, 11", 20-10d, 1.70 kips (1.28 city), HDU2
Strap schedule — STRAP3: 2-CS18, 9", 32-10d, 2.74 kips (2.06 city), HDU4
Strap schedule — STRAP4: 2-CS18, 11", 40-10d, 3.41 kips (2.56 city), HDU4
Strap schedule — STRAP5: CMSTC16, 20", 50-16d sinker, 4.49 kips (3.52 city), HDU5
Strap schedule — STRAP6: CMST14, 26", 56-16d, 6.47 kips (4.80 city), HDU8
Strap schedule — STRAP7: CMST12, 33", 74-16d, 9.22 kips (6.92 city), HDU11
Strap notes: strap connection to framing below per detail 5/S3.1; continue post to foundation; install strap over sheathing with sheathing nailing in addition
Multiple 4x4 posts with STRAP1, STRAP3, STRAP5 callouts at shearwall locations
Top plate splice type B minimum unless otherwise noted (see 2/S3.2)
Hung framing member detail reference: 12/S3.2
Header installation detail reference: 5/S3.2
Shearwall schedule reference: S2.0
Plan notes reference structural notes on S1.0 and details on S3.0-S3.1
11 plan notes covering coordination, structural wall definitions, treated wood requirements, G185 galvanized coating
APPROVED stamp — City of Long Beach, JACO20126, Date 10/09/25, Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check
NOT SHOWN: Joist hanger schedule (specific model numbers)
NOT SHOWN: Blocking layout at shearwall locations (referenced but not dimensioned)
NOT SHOWN: Simpson hardware model numbers for joist-to-beam connections

drawing_zones.content: Legend — symbols for bearing beams, hung beams, headers, posts, shearwall posts/straps, sheathing, top plate splices, joists, rafters, ceiling joists
Floor framing plan drawing — joist layout (2x12 and 2x14 @ 16" O.C.), rafter layout (2x6 @ 16" and 24" O.C.), 4x4 posts with strap callouts, shearwall locations, sheathing notes, MSR beam
City of Long Beach APPROVED stamp (JACO20126, 10/09/25)
Typ. floor sheathing note (3/4" APA Struc-1 T&G 24/0) and Typ. roof sheathing note (12" APA Exp-1 32/16)
Strap Schedule table (7 rows: STRAP1-STRAP7) with strap model, end length, nails, capacity, and holdown size; plus 3 notes
Sheet title: FLOOR FRAMING PLAN, Scale: 1/4" = 1'-0"
Title block — Ramirez Structural Inc, Jose Ramirez PE, 326 Flint Ave, New ADU Above (E) Garage, Long Beach CA 90814, Project No. 25-357, Date 9/19/25, Sheet S2.1
